CONCLUSION: Preliminary objection allowed (lack of victim status);Inadmissible
TEXT: CARDINAL . On CARDINAL DATE GPE was registered as a political party with ORG of GPE .

CARDINAL . According to GPE ’s constitutional charter , it was founded “ to support the renascence of the NORP nation , to enhance the latter ’s political activity and to protect ORG political , socio - economic and cultural rights ” . The name “ NORP ” applies to the peoples of NORP origin who speak a language which belongs to the NORP language family . Four - fifths of the LOC ( CARDINAL people ) live in GPE : the majority live in GPE and GPE , and the rest are dispersed across LOC and in the NORP region . The LOC are NORP .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Simbirsk ( Ulyanovsk ) Regional Organisation of ORG ( “ the Regional Organisation ” ) was registered with ORG . GPE claims that this was a branch of its party .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG made an appeal ( “ the appeal ” ) to the “ peoples of the NORP region , to all oppressed peoples of the empire , to ORG authorities , to historians , students of local lore , archaeologists and scientists ” , entitled “ Prevention and cancellation of the forthcoming witches’ Sabbath arranged by reactionary forces – ‘ the war party’- the so - called ‘ CARDINALth anniversary of the founding of the town of Simbirsk’ which is in fact an approximate date of the colonisation of ORG ” .
CARDINAL . NORP The appeal contained , inter alia , the following statements :
“ To the indigenous population of GPE : tartars , chuvash , erzya , moksha , PERSON , bashkir .

CARDINAL . Never allow desecration or mockery of the memory of your ancestors ; do not allow the reactionary NORP forces to celebrate the date of colonisation of Sember . Shekhry Sember is a DATE town of your glorious ancestors . In the town centre , on FAC and in the outskirts lie their graves – do not allow them to be defiled . Be prepared for the anniversary of the colonisation of ORG . On the ancestors’ Memorial Day , CARDINAL DATE at TIME , all come out to our sacred Sember Hill – to the ORG DATE between the PERSON and PERSON square . A trip to the ORG graves and the ruins of ORG will also be on offer and everyone who wishes will have an opportunity to turn to NORP . Let us stand up for the honour and dignity of our peoples . Let us celebrate the CARDINALth Anniversary of Shekhry Sember in a dignified manner , inshallah . Strive for decolonisation of the peoples who are prisoners of GPE - PERSON , the NORP empire .

CARDINAL . Who knows how much loss , humiliation , suffering , deprivation and sacrifice our peoples have endured : racial discrimination , employment discrimination , the ban on education in our native language , forced service in the ORG army ?

CARDINAL . Strive for legitimisation of indigenous languages . Strive for the holding of fair municipal elections on the basis of national communities . Strive for education for every child in the national language from primary level to higher education . Strive for satellite channels broadcasting from GPE , GPE , GPE , PERSON , GPE , GPE , ORG , GPE , GPE , GPE , GPE and GPE .

CARDINAL . Indigenous peoples idel - uras - seber - krym iort , and in particular semberile and even NORP – you are the heirs of the great NORP culture . Come back to ORG . There will be CARDINAL of us .
To the ORG administration , to PERSON and Mr PERSON personally , to historians , students of local lore , archaeologists and scientists of the region :
CARDINAL . Mr PERSON , Mr GPE and their subordinates ,

Do not fall under the influence of pseudo - historians , the “ war party ” from GPE , the local liberal democratic party , pseudo - scientists and NORP . Stop the witches’ Sabbath in celebration of the CARDINALth anniversary of the colonisation of PERSON . Even the colonisation date is intentionally confusing . The real colonisation date is DATE is a good round figure of colonisation , i.e. DATE . Do not stir up the NORP population against the indigenous peoples of GPE – you will not succeed . God be with us , inshallah .
CARDINAL . Mr PERSON , Mr GPE and local governors ,

Stop wasting our regional budget on the creation of monuments to an apostate and traitor of his peoples , the converted NORP Tartar PERSON ... , in accordance with the directions of the “ war party ” in GPE . The money saved on the witches’ Sabbath should be invested in founding a NORP ORG and introducing TV broadcasting in the local languages . Bring back education in the national language for every child .

CARDINAL . On the sacred Sember Hill between the ORG and FAC , on the burial place of our sacred ancestors , restore the remembrance tombstone destroyed by your administration ... Restore or allow to be restored the main temple Shekhry Sember on PERSON .

CARDINAL . Mr PERSON , have the courage to apologise on behalf of all your predecessors to the peoples of the Region for the centuries of humiliation , suffering , deprivation and sacrifices , since you are their successor . Someone must put an end to it .

CARDINAL . NORP ... There is no point in hiding , and it is common knowledge that there are only CARDINAL NORP , with CARDINAL being NORP speakers who do not remember their ancestors and historical - ethnic origin . Deprivation of historical and ethnic roots , of memory and the motherland is the sad result of the violence imposed in order to create a mono - ethnic and monolingual empire .
We , the peoples of the NORP region , were , are , and always will be , inshallah .

Given his DATE of experience in the national liberation movement , his courage , his knowledge of the region and his understanding of people , ORG of GPE empowers PERSON to be at the head of the national liberation fight and to form a brigade of trustworthy , courageous , consecrated and resistant people .

Let us shorten the arms of the “ war party ” in GPE ! Free the empire ’s peoples ! Decolonise GPE ! Bring NORP education in the national language to all children ! These are the common slogans of all peoples - prisoners of GPE . ”

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG asked the mayor of GPE to authorise a ceremony dedicated to the CARDINALth anniversary of the founding of Sember . On CARDINAL DATE the mayor gave permission for the ceremony to be held in places of worship belonging to religious organisations and in cemeteries .
CARDINAL . On DATE DATE ORG held a memorial ceremony in the city centre , where , according to GPE , an ancient NORP cemetery was formerly located .
CARDINAL . On DATE the prosecutor of ORG applied to ORG to have ORG activities suspended on the ground that it had called for violence , contrary to the federal legislation and LAW .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG examined the prosecutor ’s claim .
CARDINAL . Firstly , the court considered various statements made by ORG in the light of their conformity with the LAW , in particular , the appeal of CARDINAL DATE and noted that ORG :
- referred to the ORG institutions responsible for the public celebration of the CARDINALth anniversary of PERSON as “ NORP ” ;
- called for “ decolonisation of the peoples who are prisoners of GPE – PERSON , the NORP empire ” ;
- referred to GPE as “ the enemy of humankind ” ;
- referred to NORP citizens as “ NORP speakers who do not remember their ancestors and historical - ethnic origin ” ;
- urged the authorities “ to stop the witches’ Sabbath in celebration of the CARDINALth anniversary of the colonisation of PERSON ” and “ to stop wasting [ the ] regional budget ” ;
- empowered ORG secretary , PERSON , “ to be at the head of the national liberation fight and to form a brigade of trustworthy , courageous , consecrated and resistant people ” .

CARDINAL . The court also found that ORG had called for recognition of the independence of GPE and for a return by the peoples of the NORP region to NORP ( conference minutes of CARDINAL DATE ) , and that it had called on the Sember peoples to join the Tartar NORP in their national liberation fight ( minutes of ORG of DATE ) . A reference was also made to ORG of ORG activities , where the court found calls to “ decolonise GPE ” , to form military forces “ on the basis of religious confessions ” and to “ abolish the neo - imperialistic emblem depicting crosses and passports which gave no indication of ethnic origin ” .
CARDINAL . The court held that all of the above statements were incompatible with the LAW . The court stated , inter alia , the following :

“ ... ORG of ORG openly calls for violation of the integrity of GPE , for violent alteration of the foundations of constitutional governance and for the creation of an NORP State in GPE . ORG proclaims the idea of a national liberation fight and calls for the formation of a brigade of trustworthy , courageous and resistant people . The activities and opinions of ORG leaders and members are of an extreme nationalist nature , inciting people to national and religious discord and denigrating the NORP speaking population and non - adherents of ORG . ”
CARDINAL . Secondly , the court found that the memorial ceremony of DATE DATE held by ORG in the centre of GPE was in breach of the mayor ’s permit .

CARDINAL . NORP The court concluded that the activities of ORG did not correspond to the purposes declared in its LAW and violated LAW of LAW , which prohibits the establishment and activities of public associations whose aims and actions are directed at the violent alteration of the foundations of constitutional governance , violation of the integrity of GPE and the undermining of state security , the forming of armed units and incitement to social , racial , national and religious strife . The court allowed the prosecutor ’s appeal and suspended ORG activities for DATE .

CARDINAL . Ipso jure , ORG was prohibited from holding meetings , demonstrations and other public actions , taking part in elections and disposing of its bank accounts other than for the payment of expenses incurred in the course of normal activities , payment of labour contracts , damages and fines .

CARDINAL . ORG challenged the judgment of CARDINAL DATE before ORG of GPE , contending that ORG had misinterpreted the meaning of the appeal , which reflected the Tartars’ history and that there had been no incitement to national or religious strife or anything which might insult the dignity of NORP . ORG insisted that the ceremony of CARDINAL DATE had been held at the site of the ancient NORP cemetery .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the first instance judgment . An application for supervisory review was dismissed by the same court on CARDINAL DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG allowed a claim by ORG to dissolve the Regional Organisation on account of its failure to bring its LAW in compliance with new legislation . This decision has not been appealed against .
CARDINAL . The relevant provisions of GPE ’s constitutional charter read as follows :
“ The Charter of ORG ...
CARDINAL NORP ORG is a political party ...
CARDINAL ORG carries out its activities on the territory of GPE , where regional organisations are created ( GPE , GPE , ORG , GPE , ORG and GPE and GPE ) ...
CARDINAL NORP The seat of GPE ’s headquarters , ORG , is in GPE .
CARDINAL NORP All party organisations shall be autonomous in taking decisions concerning local matters in so far as these do not conflict with the party ’s Charter or its Programme .

CARDINAL ORG has been set up for the protection of citizens of NORP origin , citizens of other origin and of their political , economic , social and cultural rights and freedoms , in order to promote their active participation in the governing of the state and social affairs .
CARDINAL To achieve its goals GPE shall pursue the following objectives :
- participating as prescribed by law in the state legislative and executive bodies , by nominating its candidates to express the political will of its members ;
- promoting the creation of ethnic districts , circuits and country councils in those places where LOC are concentrated within GPE ;
- carrying out organisational activities , campaigns , propaganda and other information activities for educational and pedagogical purposes , promoting the return of the NORP script ;
- organising lectures , seminars , talks , round - table discussions , mass and collective actions and other events , in accordance with the law and the party ’s goals and objectives ; ...
- representing its ORG interests before state bodies and public institutions ; ...
CARDINAL NORP The party shall be organised on a territorial basis . The primary party units , namely the district , town , circuit and regional organisations , shall form the party ’s base .

CARDINAL LOC organisations shall be set in accordance with the administrative and territorial division of GPE and shall draw up their action programmes in accordance with local circumstances and shall elect delegates to the party ’s ORG ( PERSON ) ; in accordance with the law , they shall participate in local government structures . The regional organisations shall establish themselves as legal persons in accordance with the procedure prescribed by law . Where this is done , they shall adopt their own LAW , which may not be contrary to the party ’s LAW and its ORG , and shall register it in accordance with the law .

CARDINAL NORP The party ’s President shall be in charge of the party ’s general management between the meetings of the party ’s Congress ... he shall speak on the party ’s behalf ... and represent the party without power of attorney in any state bodies and public institutions ... ”
CARDINAL . The relevant provisions of ORG constitutional charter read as follows :
“ Charter of the PERSON ( GPE ) Regional Organisation of ORG ...
CARDINAL NORP ORG of ORG is a party political organisation ...

CARDINAL Membership of the party may be terminated by ORG ... for non - compliance with the party ’s LAW and its ORG ; this decision is subject to appeal to the party ’s higher organs , including ORG .

CARDINAL ORG of ORG has been set up for the protection of citizens of NORP origin , citizens of other origin and their political , economic , social and cultural rights and freedoms , in order to promote their active participation in the governing of the state and social affairs .
CARDINAL To achieve its goals ORG of ORG sets the following objectives :
- participating as prescribed by law in the structures of state legislative and executive bodies , by nominating its candidates to express the political will of its members ;
- promoting the creation of ethnic districts , circuits and country councils in those places where LOC are concentrated within GPE ;
- carrying out organisational activities , campaigns , propaganda and other information activities for educational and pedagogical purposes , promoting the return of the NORP script ;
- organising lectures , seminars , talks , round - table discussions , mass and collective actions and other events , in accordance with the law and the party ’s goals and objectives ;
- representing its ORG interests before state bodies and public institutions .
CARDINAL During the intervals between the [ ORG ] conferences ORG of ORG shall be in charge of the [ ORG ] activities . ”
CARDINAL . The relevant provisions of the LAW read as follows :

“ The creation and activity of public associations shall be prohibited if their aims and actions seek to alter the foundations of the constitutional system by violence , to breach the integrity of GPE , to undermine the security of the state , to create paramilitary units , or to rouse social , racial , national and religious strife . ”

“ Every person shall be guaranteed the right to freedom of conscience , freedom of religion , including the right to profess , either alone or in community with others , any or no religion , to freely choose , have and disseminate religious or other convictions and to act according to them . ”
“ Every person shall have the right to freedom of thought and speech . ”

“ Propaganda and campaigning to instigate social , racial , national or religious hatred and strife shall not be allowed . The propaganda of social , racial , national , religious or language exclusiveness shall be banned . ”
“ Every person shall have the right to freedom of association , including the right to establish trade unions to protect his interests . Free activity of public associations shall be guaranteed . ”
“ Citizens of the Russian Federation shall have the right to meet peacefully , without arms , and to organise discussions , meetings and demonstrations , as well as processions and pickets . ”
CARDINAL . At the material time , the relevant provisions of LAW read as follows :

“ The creation and activity of public associations shall be prohibited if their aims and actions seek to alter the foundations of the constitutional system by violence , to breach the integrity of GPE , to undermine the security of the state , to create paramilitary units , or to rouse social , racial , national and religious strife . ”
“ An association ’s activity may be suspended by a court decision where infringement of LAW , the constitutions ( statutes ) of the constituent entities of GPE , or the laws of GPE is found . ”

“ A court ’s decision to suspend the activities of a public association for a certain period shall entail the suspension of its right of assembly , its right to hold meetings , rallies , demonstrations and ( or ) other public actions , to participate in elections and to access funds on its bank accounts other than for payment of expenses incurred in the course of normal activities , payment of labour contracts , damages and fines ... ”

CARDINAL . Article CARDINAL of LAW of DATE provides that a legal person is autonomous in exercising its rights and carrying out its obligations , and that it has standing as a party to proceedings before a court .
